mapper.select: SELECT ua.article_id, ua.writer_seq, u.nickname, ua.title, ua.content, ua.view_cnt, ua.created_at, ua.is_edited FROM user_article ua JOIN user u ON ua.writer_seq = u.user_seq ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT ua.article_id, ua.writer_seq, u.nickname, ua.title, ua.content, ua.view_cnt, ua.created_at, ua.is_edited FROM user_article ua JOIN user u ON ua.writer_seq = u.user_seq where ua.article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_article (writer_seq, title, content) VALUES (#{writerSeq}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_article SET content = #{content}, is_edited = #{isEdited} WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
